Technosis turns toward Termitron.

Technosis: Okay, that's okay with me. Shouldn't you be helping Perplex or
something?...

Meanwhile, Burning Hammer let go of Perplex and walked backwards.

Burning Hammer: Lambda, see if you can draw out the others, I'm busy with my
fight, here.

Perplex stood up. Burning Hammer used a superkick. Perplex caught his foot
and flipped him over. Burning Hammer cartwheeled and landed on his feet,
never touching the ground. Perplex uses an uppercut. Burning Hammer grabs
his hand and hits him, knocking him down. Burning Hammer pulls him back up
by his arm and clotheslines him down. Perplex still stands back up, which
makes Burning Hammer laugh.

Burning Hammer: You know, if you just cooperated, your detah would be less
painful!

Perplex held out a hand. Burning Hammer attempted to smash his hand. Perplex
moved and flipped off Burning Hammer. He fired from his hand and knocked
Burnign hammer down. Burning Hammer realized that he had been tricked, this
guy could fire at him without using a weapon! Perplex proceeded to kick
Burning Hammer as hard as he could, about 20 times, until Burning Hammer
spit up blood. But, Perplex was shocked. Burning Hammer was not only
smiling, but laughing. he flipped to his feet and got into a fighting pose.
Perplex stepped backwards.

Burning Hammer: Stop playing with me! Fight!...

----- Original Message -----
From: <airly2000@...>

Sent: Monday, February 12, 2001 1:46 AM
Subject: Termitron.
